main event: On 8 August 1956, a large yellow object was observed in Tarrytown, New York, appearing 5 to 6 times larger than the North Star.
interesting points: The object was observed at a very high altitude,The object appeared to move very slowly to the southeast,The observation lasted for an indefinite period of time, The witness was a police sergeant,Insufficient data provided for evaluation led to the conclusion being categorized as 'Other'.
